Blog.post: yeah so i had a trumpet lesson today. it was very exciting. hehe trumpet players guild...awesome. i gotta do some stupid walkin thing on sunday. i wish i never signed up its guna suk. other then that, i hope laura gets well soon

after an exciting 36 hours awake with jim and ian, i went to sleep yestarday at 5. i woke up, looked at the clock and it said 4:11. i'm thinkin "how can it be 4? i fell asleep at 5...holy shit i slept alot. and i was ready to get up after that, but i figured that would fuk up my sleep schedule even more, so i went to sleep and awoke at 8. its about 11, band practice at noon. im listening to planet smashers while eating sunflower seeds. there's pee in the elavator dont smell to good pee in the elavator dont smell like it should

ive been awake for 28 hours strait. we rule. it seems like today is the longest day ever. at 5 we randomly got up and hit dunkin donuts. jim, within 6 seconds of getting his ice coffee, spilled it everywhere. then we got back and watched lewis black, which rules. and we played hi lo jak for a while. then we played vollyball. then, we went to the beach. then we washed some cars and played with water and stuff. then we randomly walked around. and its only fuking noon now. sweet

well, me and jim just play 3 hours of uno, 2 hours of beavis and butt head and about 2 hours of family guy. Its almost 4am, and jim just decided he wants to beat final fantasy x2. I am the champion of champions. even tho he won about 35 out of 40 games. hehehe oh yeah the dance was tonite. it was okayish. well, i got about 4 hours till the sun comes up, so i leave you with words of genius. -I believe people with a skin color other then white can govern their own countries- George Dubya
urlLink did someone say prodigy? urlLink
urlLink call it abstract art urlLink
dear ian oneil shut the hell up
the wings were hot. our waitress wasnt as hot as she was last time. bummer. i also found out that a friend of mine is a lesbian. she shall remain nameless, because she hasnt come out of the closet.

i had a taco today. but not an ordinary taco, a grande soft taco. it was huge. why? why was it so big? i was happy of course. a huge taco. what could go wrong? well, by some stroke of stupidity, they decided to drench the outside of the taco with cheese sauce. and it was ridiculoiusly sloppy. are you dumasses really reading about a taco ate today? losers. also, i have come to realize i suck at visual arts. you know, the kind of art you can look at. i am a musician. i love aqua teen hunger force. surfin early thursday and friday. cant wait. another point of interest, i have become sick of ska. and the trumpet. gotta have hendrix, led zep, stevie ray vaughn, the good shit. out lord let the sun beat down upon my face

tonite is a nite of badness. there is no aqua teen hunger force on tonite. it makes me unhappy. however, it will be on tomorrow nite, and the following five nites. for those pour souls who do not watch aqua teen hunger force, it is on cartoon network at midnite, weekdays. watch it. you wont regret it. now don quioxte de la mancha will bring thee greater glory yet

im at erins house rite now. which is odd cuz erin is off in gansett. but who cares? have you checked out my amazing art? you should. til later looking for the writing on the wall whos gonna save us? whos gonna provide us? whos gonna divide us? whos gonna save us?
urlLink wow, how good am i? here we have shake, meatwad, and frylock. aqua teen hunger force. number one in the hood g urlLink
urlLink you mite have to turn your head urlLink
urlLink yeah urlLink

i just got back from hooters. it was my first time there. it was fun, really good wings, and hot girls. our waitress was real hot. anyways, tomorow im gettin up early and goin surfin. and tomorow i can put up my amazing art. by that, i mean a picture of shake, frylock, and meatwad. Aqua teen hunger force is way cooler then you. i also took a picture of my surfboard. rebels are we though heavy our hearts shall always be no ball no chain no prison for me we're the rebels of the sacred heart.

i went surfin today. it was fun. nothin else is new. well, as soon as my brother stops being a jackass, (soon, hopefully) i can display some pictures up here. till then, adios aqua teen hunger force number one in the hood g

wow look at this. its monday nite. im a little bit bored. and i wanna do bad things. but i saw a concert last nite. it was super awesome. it goes like this. 1-reel big fish, pretty funny, and played awesome 2-rx bandits, non stop good music, and awesome moves 3-big d-they played 51, my favorite song 4-catch 22, played shitty dinosaur songs 5-lucky boys, fuckin horrible emo shit wakin up to an alarm stickin needles in your arm saying im happy when im not findin roaches in the pot
very exciting. i am fucking tired as all fuck. but i am super fuckin pshyched cuz tomorow is reel big fish, catch 22, big d. and wednsday i am going surfin. i cant fuckin wait. well i am out. fuck.
jerkin it
my name is mike. mike hunt. i cant wait for sunday.

well today was a day. or was it. yes. it was. penis whip? its summer, its fuckin summer! in ur face skool. penis whip? i saw a fukin awesome comedian on comedy central today. "How stupid do i think the americans are?" i realize, americans are stupid. really stupid. my hero is michle moore. one of the few smart people in america. i watched bowling for columbine. it was wicked awesome. and ive read two of his books. i gotta get downsize this. random threats from an unarmed american. "do you think it mite be a little dangerous to give out guns in a bank?"

so wuts up? today i had the parade. suked. but it wasnt that bad. im done with band for the year. we had a battle today. we kicked ass. they had nothing. then jims party. then my snotty little cousins bday party. i dun like her. sublime. out.

went swimmin in the bay today. was wicked fun. nice and cool. it was so nice out today. i cant wait, this sunday, im goin out and gettin a surfboard if all goes well. man i dont have the energy to listen to ska on 90+ degree days. Jack Johnson, on and on, is the ultimate summer album. just chill out. had my akoustic guitar out alot these last couple of days, again, just chillin. man im not lookin foward to saturday. i gotta do the gaspee day parade. i hope its cool out. at least theres a party at jims house after. but then i gotta go to my damn cousins party. i gotta bring my guitar, and play for a bunch of teeny boppers. tomorrows the last day of school. except exams. out. theres no such thing as time its our time its our time

my face hurts cause ive been playin trumpet so much. so heres what has happened. I learned keasby nites on trumpet. i got new sandals. i listened to the aquabats who i will not be seeing. i am now also really lookin foward to reel big fish on june 20. what fun. out.

this automatically underlines now. i dun like it one bit so i stayed up all nite last nite its six o clock gotta do damn races im gonna sleep alot tomorrow instead i got a bottle and a girl whos just 14 and a damn good case of the mexicali blues
i saw point break. it was real good. at jimmaloneys house hes gotta pool
so i start guitar lessons again today.
a pox on audio blog. Dont bother listening its badly recorded, back in black. ill stick to regular blog unless i wanna talk.

wuz noo? all my peeps, leave a comment if ur reading this. i had an adventure at sea yesterday. and aqua teen was awesome last nite. i mite be surfin today 2. out hey momma! look at me! im on my way to the promised land!
i think i put one of them trackers on. so yeah drive in was cool. i watched dodgeball again, even tho i wasnt supposed to. white chicks was so bad. i was filled with an intense rage. i love weed.

so "something" calmed me down, and i dont mean what i said last post, but i wish those two would understand how much they fucked up.
i hate jim and bill. dont talk to me.
i fucking love taco bell
so last nite, i went to taco bell. fucking awesome. i love taco bell. i had a double decker, it was so good. orgasmic. and so ends the tale.

yestarday i watched the last samuari, and point break. both were fuckin awesome. today i watched slc punk and head of state. slc punk was ok and had a great ending, head of state was a little bit predictible, and boring at times, but good. i really wanna watch more movies. they are really good except when they suck.
